scripts.start: npm run down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d --build
scripts.lint: cd api-gateway && npm run lint && cd ../module-communication && npm run lint && cd ../module-feed && npm run lint && cd ../module-user && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd api-gateway && npm run format && cd ../module-communication && npm run format && cd ../module-feed && npm run format && cd ../module-user && npm run format
scripts.migrate: cd module-feed && npm run migrate:fresh && cd ../module-user && npm run migrate:fresh
